title: Gangplank Recall Bug
body: I don't know if this is on all skins, but I know it is at least on the original skin. Whenever you recall, the box he originally sits on does not seem to be there. I just thought it would be a good idea to post this on the forum to see if it can get fixed.

replies.body:
Hiya NeoExdeth,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and working on a fix.
